divs: Sighting DetailsA co-worker and I was standing on a bridge next to the Potomac River across from Washington D.C.I look toward the Potomac River and saw a very bright blue light about 2:00 in the sky (maybe a little highter)it seem to pause and then traveled away across the Washington D.C. skyline not going up or down just away very very fast unlike anything I have ever seem before. It never flash any lights, it was just a very bright blue light sort of like a light on a police car only not flashing and much brighter. I would really like to know what this was.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around January 14th 2010
Summary: Bright Blue light that was still and then moved very fast away.
